participant_1.background:
I like to hike.
My mother is dead.
I write fiction for fun.
I have a golden retriever.
I work in advertising.

participant_2.background:
I like to hike and spend time outdoors.
My favorite thing to eat is a burrito.
I am a guy that enjoys being a guy.
I love to binge watch shows on streaming services.

content.text: Hey! I'm [user 1's name]. I like to hike and spend time outdoors. What about you?
Hi! I'm [user 2's name]. I also like to hike! My favorite thing to eat is a burrito. What's yours?
I love burritos too! I also love to write fiction for fun. Do you like to read?
I do! I love reading books and watching movies. I'm a big fan of sci-fi and fantasy.
Me too! I love anything that takes me away to another world.
Me too! I'm also a big fan of horror movies.
I'm not so much into horror movies. I'm more of a comedy person myself.
I can respect that. What are some of your favorite comedies?
I love The Hangover, The Wedding Singer, and Bridesmaids. What about you?
I love all of those movies! I also love Anchorman and Step Brothers.
Those are great movies! I'm glad we have similar taste in movies.
Me too! It's always nice to find someone who likes the same things you do.
Yeah, it is. So, what else do you like to do for fun?
I like to go to the movies, play video games, and hang out with my friends.
I like all of those things too! I'm a big fan of video games.
Me too! What are some of your favorite games?
I love the Legend of Zelda series, the Final Fantasy series, and the Pokemon series. What about you?
I love all of those games! I also love the Mario series, the Kirby series, and the Animal Crossing series.
Those are great games too! I'm glad we have similar taste in video games.
Me too! It's always nice to find someone who shares your interests.
Yeah, it is. So, what are you up to this weekend?
I'm not sure yet. Maybe I'll go to the movies or hang out with my friends.
That sounds fun! I'm not sure what I'm doing either. Maybe we can hang out?
That would be fun! What do you want to do?
We could go to the movies or play video games.
I would love to go to the movies!
Great! I'll check out what's playing and we can make a plan.
Sounds good! I can't wait.
